website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its built-in LED light, this inspection mirror is ideal for use in poorly lit spaces.
pros: 1.375-inch mirror with LED light at the top for easy viewing in dark spaces
Easy to adjust the angle of the mirror
cons: The light is not as powerful as some users were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment difficult to access
customer_reviews.text: Due to poor design, it is extremely difficult to remove the protective sleeve from the battery. Instead of having a plastic tab on the back of the mirror that is easily removable, one has to use your finger to push against a small piece of hard plastic (that is holding the mirror in place) to create enough gap to pry out the mirror in order to access the battery compartment. I wish this mirror was designed better so that the battery can be replaced with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Miltonia

customer_reviews.title: It's a Big Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very well made the glass and metal are good quality. The handle is sturdy even when you extend it out all the way. Be advised it's a very large mirror you won't be able to fit into tight spots but if you can get it where you need it, it's about the best mirror you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Slaterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirror
customer_reviews.text: I use this to do assembly inspections in cramped spaces, the adjustable length is great. Ullman makes another one that is half the length. Replacement mirrors are available. This is rebranded as Mac and Proto. Make sure to fold the mirror facing away from the handle for storage, as I have broken two when the mirror was facing towards the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror but not soo much for the handle and swivel
customer_reviews.text: I use these type mirrors daily working on engines. I found the swivel to be soo tight that I was afraid of bending the frame around the mirror. I quickly loosened the set screw slightly and then it was too loose. Just couldn't get s happy medium. Wound up taking the mirror and frame from this and putting it on my OTC handle that had a broken mirror piece. Mirror and frame are excellent quality just not the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is such poor quality, I almost threw it in the trash instead of returning it in order to help prevent it being re-sold to someone else. The mirror head case is sloppy and rattles, the mirror slips up and down in it's retainer, and the telescoping portion is very hard to open and is rough when extending it. I gave this one star because I couldn't go any lower.
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Santee, Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Good value but fragile
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very useful in my line of work, it’s also a good value. Because you don’t have to buy the telescoping rod with it. The only issue I have is that it is very fragile. I already cracked the glass on one of them by just barely placing it on the table. Seems that the mirror glass is very thin
customer_reviews.author: sammy halaby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese POC
customer_reviews.text: The mirror I received had a cracked plastic housing and broke into pieces when removed from the plastic wrapping. I repaired it with JBWeld epoxy because I need to use it immediately. The light is pathetically dim and although it will work for this project I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is tight and the glass is replaceable. ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is tight and the glass is replaceable. I probably won't replace the glass if it gets broken because a new mirror is not much more. However, it works perfectly in my application. Big enough to see part, small enough to fit inside the engine bay.
customer_reviews.author: Qiong Jia

customer_reviews.title: Intended to use as dental mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could peak at my upper molars with a light. No problem with the flexibility of the item, but the light is very dim (new). I think i might have to replace the battery(s).... which shouldn’t even have to happen if bought new. Next time will buy a simple dental tooth mirror, and point a flashlight in my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: W McCann

customer_reviews.title: RUGGED PRODUCT, A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS SO RUGGED..I HAVE DROPPED IT ON CONCRETE, IN MY TRUCK, IN MY HOME ON WOOD FLOOR AND IT DOESN'T KNOW HOW TO BREAK. GREAT GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK PAUL

customer_reviews.title: I can see around corners and...
customer_reviews.text: Into outer space with this! I think it's better than the mirror on the Hubble space craft! See ya soon at Area 51
customer_reviews.author: Gdubz

customer_reviews.title: Larger than a dental mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was the closest thing I could find to a quality lighted dental mirror. It is a little larger than a dental mirror, but it works for this purpose. The light switch is finicky and the light is sometimes still on when I switch it off.
customer_reviews.author: sandra diliegghio

customer_reviews.title: The connection to the wand is average
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is easy to use for underneath inspection but the mounting of the mirror is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for a mechanic
customer_reviews.text: For my type of inspection use for respirator devices it eas too bright anf not enough lit viewing field
customer_reviews.author: bradley pocock

customer_reviews.title: Great for older adults
customer_reviews.text: Great to use when you are older and need something under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Tormey

customer_reviews.title: Ullman K-2L
customer_reviews.text: The hex rod reliably keeps the mirror position where you need it. Mirror positioning and rod extension are smooth and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: Good item I like it with fast Shipping I very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Fausto

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good mirror
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything it says to be a mirror and it reflects well. The glass doesn’t move and it’s well made.
customer_reviews.author: SRami

customer_reviews.title: could be longer
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, would have liked one a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the toolbox
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use this, but when I do it works great. Excellent addition to the toolbox
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than what I expected , and the quality felt more plastic . but good for what I needed it
customer_reviews.author: daisy villa

customer_reviews.title: Lighted inspection mirror
customer_reviews.text: Overall works pretty well however the lamp seems to be in the wrong spot for optimal illumination. I think it would work better if the lamp was placed at the bottom of the mirror rather than the top since it would reflect the light from the mirror to the object you are trying to view. The mirror head is a little bulky making it a bit tougher to insert in tight areas. A remote mechanism for adjusting the mirror would be a great addition. For the money it is a good value and a useful item for ones toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little dental tool, fits very nicely in mouth,great quality , made durable . strong , not cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Gas Tank Repair Tool
customer_reviews.text: I was restoring a old Porsche Gas Tank, these worked out perfect to inspect the inside.
customer_reviews.author: gregory lord

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We check with this mirror our house lip, mice like to get in. Its great and easy
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: Mostly does what you expect it will.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well - in some cases it's hard to get the light and the mirror lined up so you can see what you're aiming at - but overall it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Moffat

customer_reviews.title: These came in as expected, I wish the seller ...
customer_reviews.text: These came in as expected, I wish the seller would have shown what type of weld the mirrors fixture had. After some use the weld comes loose. There some older models hat had a full strong weld not just some spot welding.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. It really keeps the position you adjust it to. works in some and distant areas.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Krawford

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: fits into tight spots and the light is a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: Steven Anastas

customer_reviews.title: good product it works it does what it was designed ...
customer_reviews.text: good product it works it does what it was designed to do
customer_reviews.author: rafal

customer_reviews.title: Ullman Inspection Light
customer_reviews.text: The Ullman Inspection Light was exactly as described and delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: wguarino56

customer_reviews.title: Light is a plus
customer_reviews.text: Having the lighted mirror helps out a lot in tight dark spaces. The handle is durable enough for what I needed and the extension arm should hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than anticipated. Works well and Erik be able to use it for looking into smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get one with two or more LED lights on it
customer_reviews.author: SJHANKS

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA and cheaper than poor quality Chinese parts store junk
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Made in the USA and cheaper than poor quality Chinese parts store junk.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband needed to help him work underneath his race car.
customer_reviews.author: TerriJ

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and mirror is replaceable. Great to see behind tight cabinets, around the car engine, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JCT

customer_reviews.title: Makes your work much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medical device inspector and this small device comes very handy for checking details👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: shahrzi

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a very timely fashion & appears exactly as described ...
customer_reviews.author: Ram Jam

customer_reviews.title: Simple Solid telescoping mirror that does what I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple Solid telescoping mirror that does what I need to inspect inside and back side of equipment and see what I need. Metal frame around mirror edge is a plus - expect it to last for many years
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: No mirror
customer_reviews.text: Yeah so just received this in the mail it says it comes with a mirror but it didn’t come with one ? Please get back to me
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: can get them cheaper and better quality at our local hardware store
customer_reviews.text: Received broken, very agitated as didn't even bother buying a new one or sending back. can get them cheaper and better quality at our local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Case

customer_reviews.title: This is a great option for repairing your telescoping mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for repairing your telescoping mirror. The price is right, and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Max-223

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my second one, first lasted 20 yrs before i finally lost it
customer_reviews.author: Mastertech

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the $15 the Snap-On guy wanted
customer_reviews.text: This replacement mirror will work as a replacement for the Matco 3-1/4" inspection mirror. Much better than the $15 the Snap-On guy wanted. It looks to be of decent quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad G.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Cheap plastic broke in less than a week and LED light will no longer stay attached to mirror
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted it to do -- inspect the inside of 2.5" cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Ullman mirrors deliver
customer_reviews.text: Ullman mirrors deliver consistent quality and these lighted mirrors really do help when light is needed for the task on hand. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: tom mulrooney

customer_reviews.title: lit nspection mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different mirrors but this one is the tops. The size is good giving a wide viewe and the lamps do a good job in lighting the area.
customer_reviews.author: sig

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cool. But it needs led lighting improvement.
customer_reviews.author: djorgious

customer_reviews.title: Good quality telescoping mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Good quality telescoping mechanism. I liked the longer length so I don't have to bend over while examining objects near the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor LED
customer_reviews.text: We expected more from the magnifier and LED combination. The LED does not provide enough light to make us useful.
customer_reviews.author: A&W-KF

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made & delivered quickly. Light is bright & can obscure the intended object.
customer_reviews.author: g.p.burdell

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: the only problem I've had with the mirror is the head screw needing tightening. It came a little loose and with the weight of the mirror it would flop at certain angles. After tightening it once I haven't had anymore problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T.

customer_reviews.title: Me likey.
customer_reviews.text: Spiffy idea. Works well,not good. Superman does good, this works well.
customer_reviews.author: yourpaintballgod

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Would recommend to others. Would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Although the item does the job, don't take it in a rough environment. The plastic did not hold up for me, it slipped out of my pocket and fell 12 feet onto a steel deck. Plastic broke and light did not work again.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Light is so so
customer_reviews.text: Light is so so, mirror is good, lights are a novelty I would stick with a basic mirror next time
customer_reviews.author: streetglide18

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't telescope
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't telescope, even though it's advertised as it does. But it's the only small mirror I found.
customer_reviews.author: Clif

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy folds up small easy to use light weight just right size nice grip exactly why I needed and expected of product

customer_reviews.title: lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror part and light tend to fall off when I use it. I will probably tape it together; other than that the price is reasonable and it works well when it doesn't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sluggermike

customer_reviews.title: It's a great mirror and the long handle reaches so places better ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mirror and the long handle reaches so places better than the shorter version. Very pleased with my purchase. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Great for looking down pipe, around corners, checking to find tools you drop. Gave some away to friends, other welders because they are so handy.

customer_reviews.title: lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: the light backing does not stay connected to the mirror, so every time I use it I have to hold the pieces together.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for geocaching
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to look into places before, or instead of, using my hand. Wish the light was easier to turn on though.

customer_reviews.title: Good little tool.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Heavy duty. Long telescoping extension. Don't buy it to look down your throat -- it's too big for that. I wish the light spread out more -- it's rather focused into a narrow beam. But I guess if it spread out more it might shine in your eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made item and worked as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the Special Inspections side of construction and this product allows me to visually evaluate areas that are difficult to access.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one did not work all all; switch would not work.

customer_reviews.title: lighted inspection mirror
customer_reviews.text: this works great with my 830 Bernina sewing machine to check that the bobbin thread is loaded correctly for embroidery!!

customer_reviews.title: Too big and clunky. Was going to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big and clunky. Was going to use it to nest-check my Purple Martins, but couldn't get it past the hole. Might work for other uses, just not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V.

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror. I thought I ordered the one with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror. I thought I ordered the one with the light. I guess I didn't read the details correctly. I use the mirror to check crawl spaces
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Saves Work
customer_reviews.text: I attach it to a longer pole and use it to check our gutters. Saves pulling out the big ladder.
customer_reviews.author: meemom

customer_reviews.title: DOA: Defective Switch
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. Unit arrived Dead On Arrival. Opened the package pulled out the plastic that prevents the battery from accidently being used, and the light came on immediately. So I thought okay this confirms that the battery is good. Then went to slide the switch to turn it off, and the switch moved to its off position, but the light stayed on! Wiggled it back and forth a few times, but the light stayed on. It's a cheap small switch, which didn't give me confidence to replace it with another one. Will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: CJnOC

customer_reviews.title: I like it wish the mirror was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I like it wish the mirror was bigger, I used it at my job for inspections but a larger mirror would help more.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very useful. Great reach and swivel LED light is a big help. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: the actual mirror could be a little bigger to serve my purpose; but the quality is good.

customer_reviews.title: Inspection Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, fast shipping. Great Price. A third the price of local industrial suppliers. Would highly recommend to others. Will be ordering again for stock items in our warehouse and engineer needs.

customer_reviews.title: Decent mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Decent mirror for the price. Works good for inspecting hard to see components.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked as expected and does what a mirror should do.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Needed this for work to check for loose ...

customer_reviews.title: Not a Telescoping Mirror as listed in the discription.
customer_reviews.text: The discription call it a telescoping inspection mirror. This mirror is not telescoping and will not work for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for automobile use and hvac inspections.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror, built well and the size is perfect for most uses.
customer_reviews.author: jackh

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is well-made of good materials, and does exactly what it is supposed to do. My previous inspection mirror (in which the glass finally broke) did not have a telescoping handle, and I find the telescoping feature in this mirror extremely useful. The telescoping handle and the mirror both adjust easily, and remain in place after they have been adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Chimes

customer_reviews.title: nice grip. Good protective plastic around mirror
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice grip. Good protective plastic around mirror. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chris oliphant

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality but was too small for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Amy Walk

customer_reviews.title: Not for use as a dental device
customer_reviews.text: This Ullman C-2 Circular Telescopic Inspection Mirror would be fine using this mirror for mouth inspection if you are a horse. Again, I should have paid more attention to the size (2-1/4 inches in diameter). It would not fit in the mouth of a human being.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Mechanics Inspection Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great mechanics mirror - light is bright and the angle adjustment has an adjustment screw so you can stiffen the angle without it flopping around like a wet noodle or moving with a slight bump. The hand grip is made for a man with hams for hands (muscular) - this is not a panty-waist, doctor’s instrument – it is made tuff and a must have for a person that needs to light-up the darkest of holes.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Great light and clear mirror. Beats the "dental" versions you can get anywhere where the mirror degrades. Can also use for work shop to look in tight spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Cally D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the added feature of the light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Able to see way in the back of my mouth as far as I could go and I feel like a dentist when I'm using this item. The light on it is an added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: It's a mirror
customer_reviews.text: That is all I have to say about it. Same cheap Chinese garbage that plagues the tool industry. The only useful function that warrants paying more than $1.99 is the fact that it has a light and a nice grip. The battery door broke before I was able to use it, but I made it work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient as hell. I am a turbine mechanic, and believeeeee meeeee I use this little guy quite a bit. Then only reason it isn't five stars is because of the difficulty in replacing batter/eventual breakage from replacing battery. Everything else is great, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Polski

product_meta.title: Ullman Devices HTE-LT2 Round Inspection Mirror - Swivel Free LED Telescopic Mirror with Quick Release Tab, Stainless Steel Handle
product_meta.description: Size:Diameter: 1-3/8", Length: 6-1/2" to 35"| Style:RoundRound inspection mirror is a highly functional tool offering limitless uses in homes, shops, workshops, and construction sites. Round telescopic mirror is sturdily constructed and yet is light in weight. It features an all-angle ball joint that keeps the mirror stable at the required angle for a steady job. The swivel-free antenna of the length adjustable mirror is designed to avoid unnecessary mirror movements. The stick length can be adjusted anywhere between 6-1/2 in. and 35 in. to reach narrow and confined places easily. LED round mirror works on two round lithium batteries and allows a clear inspection in darker areas. The mirror telescope with a sturdy stainless-steel handle is the perfect solution for inspection required for repair task, searching things, exploring hidden spaces and to find machinery faults.
feature_bullets: LED Inspection Mirror: inspection mirror telescopes for easy adjustments at different angles. The round mirror with an LED light at the top of head illuminates darker areas

Utility: Ullman telescopic mirror enables you to peep into automotive engines, guitars, under and behind large furniture and other confined places for inspection, repairing, and to search for missing objects
Swivel Free: the swivel-free antenna of the mechanics mirror prevents unwanted mirror swinging whereas the all-angle ball joint holds the mirror firmly at the desired angle
Sturdy Construction: easy-to-carry, swivel-free telescopic mirror features a strong and lightweight stainless-steel handle that can be extended to inspect hard-to-reach places
Specifications: Ullman inspection mirror with 1-3/8 in. Diameter is equipped with an adjustable stick. The stick’s length can be adjusted from 6-1/2 in. to 35 in.
